definition: abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: My teenaged nephew's face is covered with zits.
sentences.chinese: 我那正值青春期的侄子脸上长满青春痘。

sentences.english: Sex education among junior middle school students is a recent introduction to the practice of quality-oriented education in China.
sentences.chinese: 初中生青春期性教育是我国素质教育的新领域。

sentences.english: We adults must remember, the young, at a stage of growing and learning.
sentences.chinese: 我们成年人必须记住青春期是成长和学习的关键阶段。

sentences.english: Is there really an immature "teenage brain" that holds them back?
sentences.chinese: 真有尚未成熟的“青春期大脑”拖住他们？

sentences.english: I think I became adolescent in my middle school days.
sentences.chinese: 想起中学时代开始我的青春期。

sentences.english: Left-handers are believed to reach puberty 4 to 5 months after right-handers.
sentences.chinese: 左撇子人的青春期会比右撇子晚来4到5个月。

sentences.english: The brothel she lived in specialized in pre-pubescent girls.
sentences.chinese: 这里住的大多数是正直青春期的少女。

sentences.english: He is concerned with his entrance into puberty, and Malena is his greatest object of desire in town.
sentences.chinese: 玛莱娜成为了他进入青春期的最大的迷恋对象。

sentences.english: Dextroamphetamine:cognitive and behavioral effects in normal prepubertal boys.
sentences.chinese: 在正常的青春期前的男孩中的认知而动作的效果。

sentences.english: Coming here in Cina was just like going back to the childhood going through the adolescence I have never had.
sentences.chinese: 来到中国就像是在青春期回到了我从未经历过的童年。

sentences.english: Zhang Yiwu, professor of Chinese literature at Peking University, distinguishes youth from adolescence.
sentences.chinese: 北京大学中文系教授张颐武将青春和青春期区分开来。

sentences.english: Objective To study the relationship between psychosocial factors and female post-adolescent acne.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨心理社会因素与女性青春期后痤疮的关系。

sentences.english: Objective To observe therapeutic effect of marvelon for puberty dysfunctional uterine bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨妈富隆治疗青春期功血的临床应用价值。

sentences.english: Usually, only pubescent or adult males are able to grow beards.
sentences.chinese: 一般来讲，只有青春期的或者成年男子才能长胡子。

sentences.english: Some teenager girls got a crush on the film star.
sentences.chinese: 许多青春期的女生对影视明星都很迷恋。

sentences.english: The peaks of one's adolescent reading can prove troughs in late middle age.
sentences.chinese: 一个人青春期阅读的高峰可以检验中年后的低谷。

definition: first awakening of love (usually of a girl) (idiom)
age when girls start to develop feelings for the opposite sex/puberty
